title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in the java editor.
OB: When I answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog and then double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it, the contents of the file are replaced within a few seconds. However, if I repeat steps 1 and 2, and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
EB: I expect the 'Revert' option in the pop-up menu to execute with a similar speed as closing and reopening the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog.
2. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2.
4. Select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor.
